items.sentence: It\'s easy to understand why people trust Tom.
It\'s going to be a while until Tom gets here.
I\'d rather kiss my grandmother than kiss you.
I\'ll be in Australia until October twentieth.
I\'ll never figure this out without some help.
Tom\'s body was discovered near Mary\'s house.
Many thousands on both sides had been wounded.
Mary came to Boston, hoping to find a husband.
Mary hardly ever talks to her husband anymore.
Tom threw the apple core into the garbage can.
